title: Watch: Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla ambushed at Davos over efficacy of Covid vaccine , stays mum | International - Times of India Videos
description: Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla was cornered by two reporters over the efficacy of his company's Covid vaccine. The reporters of Rebel News first asked pointed questions on allegations that the company was not transparent on the efficacy of the vaccines. But as Bourla stayed mum, they kept asking several slanted questions. The video of the encounter has garnered over 6 million views on Twitter alone.
